snippet: Karri Ramo finished with 31 saves, Mike Cammalleri and Kevin Westgarth scored 15 seconds apart in the first period, and the Calgary Flames beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 4-1 Thursday night....

headline.print_headline: Ramo Stops 31 Shots to Lead Flames Past Lightning
headline.main: Ramo Stops 31 Shots to Lead Flames Past Lightning

lead_paragraph: Karri Ramo finished with 31 saves, Mike Cammalleri and Kevin Westgarth scored 15 seconds apart in the first period, and the Calgary Flames beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 4-1 Thursday night.
